shortcuts.name: Material List Generator 3.1
shortcuts.description: Enter the quantity installed devices on your project and a material list will be generated.

shortcuts.name: Count Helper
shortcuts.description: Make custom buttons that will increase by 1 everytime its clicked. Usefull for keeping track of materials needed while walking the job or reviewing your print.

shortcuts.name: To-Do list
shortcuts.description: Just a simple to-do list. You can add items to the list and check them off when they are complete.

screenshots.description: Manifest information on the Report Card

name: Material List Generator 3.0
description: A Progressive Web App that autogenerates a material list based on user input.
